item.description: Nice post Steve, also, it was great to meet you at the SQL Friends Lunch on Friday. I look forward to being able to gain more knowledge through all that the SQL community has to offer.

item.title: By: Steve Hughes (DataOnWheels)
item.dc:creator: Steve Hughes (DataOnWheels)
item.description: @denglishbi also pointed out to me that the tabular model is able to implement SSAS security which is a significant difference between the tabular model and PowerPivot. Thanks Dan.
item.content:encoded: @denglishbi also pointed out to me that the tabular model is able to implement SSAS security which is a significant difference between the tabular model and PowerPivot. Thanks Dan.
